hero.title: Dental Implants in Guangxi, China — Save 60–70%
hero.subtitle: Nanning is Guangxi's dental tourism hub — 300+ licensed clinics, EU/US standards. Single implants from $1,200, backed by a 20-year quality guarantee. All-inclusive 3-week packages from $7,800.

whyChooseUs.title: Why Choose Guangxi for Dental Tourism?

quality.title: 300+ Dental Clinics in Nanning
quality.description: Nanning is a fully developed dental tourism hub. 300+ licensed clinics operate to EU/US protocols with German 3D CBCT imaging and internationally certified implant systems — world-class care at local prices.

cost.title: Save 60–70% — From $1,200 Per Implant
cost.description: A single implant costs $3,000–$6,000 in the US. In Nanning, the same brand and protocol starts from $1,200 all-in — saving you 60–70%. All-on-4 full-mouth from $12,000 vs. $30,000+ in North America. Every implant backed by a 20-year quality guarantee.

tcm.title: Guangxi Wellness & Recovery Culture
tcm.description: Guangxi is China's premier wellness destination. Recover post-surgery with herbal baths in Bama Longevity Valley, scenic cruises on the Li River, and immersion in Zhuang culture — nature as medicine.

tourism.title: Scenic Recovery Tour Included
tourism.description: Spend recovery weeks in Guangxi's UNESCO-class landscapes — Detian Transnational Waterfall, Bama Longevity Valley, and Guilin karst mountains. Healing is better surrounded by beauty.

featuredServices.title: Dental Implants in Nanning
featuredServices.subtitle: Premium dental care from Guangxi's top-rated clinics, combined with a scenic Guangxi recovery tour

featuredHospitals.title: Our Partner Clinic
featuredHospitals.subtitle: Nanning's premier dental implant center — approved by the National Health Commission

recovery.title: 3 Weeks in Guangxi — Heal & Explore
recovery.description: Your 3-week package is designed around your recovery timeline. Week 1 is your implant procedure. Weeks 2–3 let you relax, tour, and recover in one of China's most scenic provinces.
items: Detian Transnational Waterfall & Tongling Grand Canyon
Bama Longevity Valley — 10-session herbal bath therapy
Guilin karst mountains & Li River cruise
Sanjianhai Lake boat tour & Yao ethnic culture

cta.title: Get a Free Implant Consultation
cta.subtitle: Tell us your dental needs — we'll prepare a full cost breakdown and itinerary within 24 hours

dentalCare.name: Dental Implants
dentalCare.description: Single implants, All-on-4, and full-mouth reconstruction at Nanning Xiangya Dental — using Swiss ITI, US Zirconia, and Korean Osstem systems with German 3D CBCT imaging.

healthCheckup.name: Pre-Op CT Checkup
healthCheckup.description: Full 3D CBCT scan and dental health assessment before your procedure. Identifies bone density, nerve position, and sinus proximity to ensure safe implant placement.

tcm.name: TCM Herbal Bath Recovery
tcm.description: Bama-style medicinal herbal soaking therapy to reduce post-surgical inflammation, improve circulation, and speed up implant osseointegration during your recovery weeks.

xiangya.name: Nanning Xiangya Dental Clinic
xiangya.description: Approved by China's National Health Commission, Xiangya Dental is Nanning's premier implant center. Located in Qingxiu Wanda Plaza, with ~500 sqm of dedicated treatment space and multiple private surgical suites.

guangxiMedical.name: Guangxi Medical University First Affiliated Hospital
guangxiMedical.description: Top-tier teaching hospital providing pre-op bloodwork, anesthesia consultation, and emergency backup support for our international dental patients.

nanningFirst.name: The First People's Hospital of Nanning
nanningFirst.description: Comprehensive tertiary hospital available for additional health screenings, CT imaging, and specialist referrals during your stay.

pricing.title: All-Inclusive Medical Travel Packages
pricing.subtitle: Everything covered — except your international flight.
pricing.disclaimer: Prices cover the complete 3-week package: procedure, hotel, meals, transport, tour, and TCM recovery. Contact us for a personalized quote.

packages.title: What's Included in Every Package
packages.subtitle: All-inclusive except international airfare — everything else is handled
items: Airport pickup and all in-country transfers
28 nights hotel accommodation
Daily meals (3 per day)
Full implant procedure at Xiangya Dental
3D CBCT pre-op imaging & post-op checkups
5-day Guangxi scenic tour (Detian, Guilin, Bama)
10 TCM herbal bath sessions
Dedicated English-speaking patient coordinator
24/7 support hotline

about.title: About MedTravel China
about.subtitle: MedTravel China specializes in premium dental implant travel packages for North American patients seeking world-class care at a fraction of the cost.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: We connect North American patients with Nanning Xiangya Dental Clinic — one of Guangxi's most advanced implant centers — and wrap the experience in a full 3-week recovery tour across Guangxi's natural wonders. You get the dental work done right, and come home having experienced something unforgettable.
points: Partner with China's best dental clinics, not just the cheapest
Build complete packages so patients never have to figure out logistics alone
Combine post-op recovery with authentic Guangxi travel
Protect patients with transparent pricing and clear contracts

values.title: Our Core Values
values.subtitle: The principles that guide everything we do

care.title: Patient-First
care.description: All decisions — clinic selection, itinerary, pricing — center on patient safety and comfort.

excellence.title: Clinical Excellence
excellence.description: Xiangya Dental uses the same implant systems and protocols as top US and European clinics.

trust.title: Full Transparency
trust.description: Itemized pricing, written contracts, and no hidden fees. You know exactly what you're paying for.

accessibility.title: Accessible Pricing
accessibility.description: Save 60–70% vs. North American rates without compromising on quality of care.

whyGuangxi.title: Why Nanning & Guangxi?
whyGuangxi.description: Nanning is Guangxi's capital — a modern, international city with excellent hospitals and direct flights from major hubs. After surgery, Guangxi offers some of China's most spectacular scenery: the Detian waterfall, Bama longevity valley, Guilin karst mountains, and more — all within a 4-hour drive.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.subtitle: Your privacy is important to us. This policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal information.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: MedTravel China ("we", "us", or "our") is committed to protecting the privacy of our users. This Privacy Policy describes how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your personal information when you use our website and services. We comply with applicable data protection laws including the EU General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR), the California Privacy Rights Act (CPRA), and the People's Republic of China Personal Information Protection Law (PIPL).

collection.title: Information We Collect
collection.content: We collect personal information that you voluntarily provide to us when you:
items: Fill out our contact or inquiry forms (name, email, phone number)
Request a medical service consultation
Subscribe to our communications
Communicate with us via email, phone, or messaging platforms
collection.additionalContent: We may also automatically collect certain technical information such as your IP address, browser type, device information, and usage data through cookies and similar technologies.

usage.title: How We Use Your Information
usage.content: We use your personal information for the following purposes:
items: To respond to your inquiries and provide requested medical travel services
To coordinate with partner hospitals on your behalf
To send you relevant information about our services (with your consent)
To improve our website and user experience
To comply with legal obligations

sharing.title: Information Sharing
sharing.content: We may share your personal information with:
items: Our partner hospitals and medical facilities in Guangxi, China, as necessary to arrange your medical services
Service providers who assist us in operating our website and providing services
Legal authorities when required by applicable law
sharing.additionalContent: We do not sell your personal information to third parties.

gdpr.title: Your Rights Under GDPR (European Union)
gdpr.content: If you are a resident of the European Economic Area (EEA), you have the following rights under the GDPR:
items: Right of Access: Request a copy of the personal data we hold about you
Right to Rectification: Request correction of inaccurate or incomplete personal data
Right to Erasure: Request deletion of your personal data under certain circumstances
Right to Restrict Processing: Request limitation of processing of your personal data
Right to Data Portability: Receive your personal data in a structured, commonly used format
Right to Object: Object to processing of your personal data for certain purposes
Right to Withdraw Consent: Withdraw consent at any time where processing is based on consent
gdpr.additionalContent: To exercise these rights, please contact us at privacy@medtravel-china.com. We will respond to your request within 30 days.

cpra.title: Your Rights Under CPRA (California, USA)
cpra.content: If you are a California resident, the California Privacy Rights Act (CPRA) provides you with the following rights:
items: Right to Know: Know what personal information is collected, used, shared, or sold
Right to Delete: Request deletion of personal information collected from you
Right to Correct: Request correction of inaccurate personal information
Right to Opt-Out: Opt out of the sale or sharing of your personal information
Right to Limit Use of Sensitive Personal Information: Limit how we use your sensitive personal information
Right to Non-Discrimination: Not be discriminated against for exercising your privacy rights
cpra.additionalContent: We do not sell or share personal information for cross-context behavioral advertising. To submit a request, contact us at privacy@medtravel-china.com.

pipl.title: Your Rights Under PIPL (People's Republic of China)
pipl.content: Under China's Personal Information Protection Law (PIPL), you have the following rights regarding your personal information:
items: Right to Know and Decide: Be informed about and make decisions regarding the processing of your personal information
Right to Access and Copy: Access and obtain copies of your personal information
Right to Rectification and Completion: Request correction or completion of your personal information
Right to Deletion: Request deletion of your personal information under certain circumstances
Right to Explanation: Request an explanation of personal information processing rules
Right to Withdraw Consent: Withdraw consent for processing based on consent, without affecting prior lawful processing
Right to Portability: Transfer your personal information to a designated handler under conditions prescribed by the CAC
pipl.additionalContent: For cross-border transfers of personal information outside of China, we follow PIPL requirements including obtaining separate consent and conducting security assessments as required. Contact us at privacy@medtravel-china.com to exercise your rights.

retention.title: Data Retention
retention.content: We retain your personal information only for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes outlined in this policy, unless a longer retention period is required or permitted by law. Medical-related inquiry records may be retained for up to 3 years to comply with healthcare regulations.

security.title: Data Security
security.content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. These measures include encrypted data transmission (SSL/TLS), secure data storage, and access controls.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy or wish to exercise your data protection rights, please contact us:
contact.address: Address: 123 Medical Street, Guilin, Guangxi 541000, China

contact.title: Contact Us

form.title: Send Us a Message
form.description: Fill out the form below and we'll get back to you within 24 hours.
form.name: Full Name
form.success: Thank you! Your message has been sent. We'll contact you soon.

items.question: Am I a good candidate for dental implants?
items.answer: Most adults with good general health qualify. We ask you to send us a recent panoramic X-ray or CBCT scan (or we'll arrange one on arrival). Our Xiangya team will assess bone density, gum health, and sinus proximity before confirming a treatment plan.

items.question: How long do I need to stay in China?
items.answer: Our standard package is 3 weeks. Week 1 is for surgery and initial healing. Weeks 2–3 you'll tour Guangxi and do your herbal bath recovery sessions, returning for a check-up before you fly home. Same-day or 2-stage implants can be discussed for shorter stays.

items.question: What implant brands do you use?
items.answer: Xiangya Dental offers Swiss ITI (Straumann), US Zirconia ET, and Korean Osstem systems — all internationally recognized brands used in US and EU clinics. Brand and material choice affects cost and is discussed during your consultation.

items.question: Do you provide visa assistance?
items.answer: Yes. We provide a formal invitation letter from Xiangya Dental Clinic to support your medical visa application, plus guidance on the application process from our US team.

items.question: Is payment secure?
items.answer: All payments are made to the designated receiving account stated in your written service agreement. We provide itemized invoices and a written service agreement before you pay anything. We do not collect payments through third-party travel agents.

review.intro: Had a great experience with MedTravel China? We'd love to hear from you. Please take a moment to share your feedback on one of the platforms below.

review.note: All reviews should reflect your genuine experience. We appreciate honest, constructive feedback.
review.thankYou: Thank you for helping us grow!
